title: Random "Ear-rape" In League
body:
So, one day, out of no where, I played a game in league, and my headphones went all "earrape." I had to unplug my headphones, and it fixed it, and today the same thing happened. I believe it happened when the "Defeat" came up, and I believe it is an audio corruption. Please send help.
                                                                                                                                                   -Donkey

replies.body: I can only imagine what that might sound like.  xO.Ox   I get a headache just thinking about it!  If this is only happening with league, then some bad game files could be the culprit.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a repair to get that fixed up.  Make sure your drivers are up to date as well!  Let me know if that helps.
